Name: The Ocho Watchman
Ingredients: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: A dry aperitivo style cocktail in which the aged rum shines through with Cynar adding bittersweet complexity.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Matthew Boyle at Field Guide & The Clever Barkeep Ltd, Halifax, Canada
Nutrition: One serving of The Ocho Watchman contains 195 calories
